mapper.select: SELECT art.ID_ AS id, art.EXECUTION_ID_ AS executionId, art.PROC_INST_ID_ AS processInstanceId, art.PROC_DEF_ID_ AS processDefinitionId, art.NAME_ AS name, art.TASK_DEF_KEY_ AS taskDefinitionKey, art.ASSIGNEE_ AS assignee, art.CREATE_TIME_ AS createTime, art.SUSPENSION_STATE_ AS suspensionState, art.TENANT_ID_ AS tenantId, art.FORM_KEY_ AS formKey FROM act_ru_task art WHERE art.ASSIGNEE_ = #{assignee}
